configuracoes.erroRedefinirSenha: Error resetting password. Please try again.
configuracoes.inserirNovaSenha: Enter your new password below to reset it.

mutirao.resposta: A mutir√£o is a collective action, usually voluntary, to perform tasks for the benefit of a community or social cause.

participar.pergunta: How can I participate in a mutir√£o?
participar.resposta: Just go to the 'Mutir√µes' tab, choose an event of interest and click 'Participate'. You will receive all necessary information by email.

ajudar.pergunta: How can I help beyond participating in person?
ajudar.resposta: You can help by spreading the word about mutir√µes, donating materials, inviting friends, or even suggesting new actions for the community.

objetivo.pergunta: What is the purpose of mutir√µes?
objetivo.resposta: Our goal is to promote collaboration, strengthen community bonds and generate positive impact through volunteer work.

cancelar.resposta: Yes, you can cancel your participation at any time on the mutir√£o page where you registered.

certificado.pergunta: Do I receive a certificate when participating?
certificado.resposta: Some mutir√µes offer participation certificates. Check the event description or contact the organizer.

gratuito.pergunta: Do I need to pay to participate?
gratuito.resposta: No, all mutir√µes are free for volunteers.

organizar.resposta: Any registered person can suggest and organize a mutir√£o, subject to approval by the site team.

aceito.pergunta: How do I know if I was accepted in a mutir√£o?
aceito.resposta: You will receive a notification and confirmation email once your registration is approved.

restricoes.pergunta: I have physical restrictions, can I participate?
restricoes.resposta: Yes! Many mutir√µes have diverse tasks, including light activities. Check the event description or talk to the organizer.

contato.pergunta: How do I contact the organizers?
contato.resposta: On each mutir√£o page there is a field for questions and comments, plus the contact of the person responsible for the event.

mutiroes.semMutiroesDesc: Mutir√µes you registered for and/or created will appear here.

usuario.descricao: Start by creating a mutir√£o or find one to volunteer. Together, we can transform the world!

geral.loginAutomaticoErro: Registration completed, but there was a problem logging in automatically. Please log in.
geral.loginAutomaticoFalhou: Registration completed, but automatic login failed. Please try logging in manually.
geral.placeholderEndereco: Type the address and select the correct option
geral.ajudarFazBem: Helping is good for others and for you.

novoMutirao.necessitaMateriais: Do you need Tools, Materials and/or Specific Skills?
novoMutirao.termos: I agree to organize this mutir√£o responsibly, respecting community guidelines and ensuring a safe and inclusive environment for all participants.
novoMutirao.erroLogin: You need to be logged in to create a mutir√£o.
novoMutirao.erroEndereco: Please fill in the base address by selecting a suggestion.

inscricao_confirmada.mensagem: Your registration for the mutir√£o "{{mutirao}}" was successfully confirmed!

inscricao_cancelada.mensagem: Your registration for the mutir√£o "{{mutirao}}" was cancelled. We hope to see you in other events!

alerta.mensagem: Attention: an alert occurred in the system.

quotes.quote1: No one is so small that they cannot help, nor so great that they do not need help.
quotes.quote2: True greatness lies in serving others without expecting anything in return.
quotes.quote3: A small act of kindness can transform a day, a life, and even the world.
quotes.quote4: Be the change you wish to see in the world.
quotes.quote5: Volunteering is the art of giving without losing, of receiving without asking.
quotes.quote6: When you reach out to help someone, you also lift yourself up.
quotes.quote7: Solidarity is the language of the heart.
quotes.quote8: No act of kindness, no matter how small, is wasted.
quotes.quote9: When we help others, we discover the true purpose of our existence.
quotes.quote10: Doing good to others is the most beautiful way to enrich the soul.
